user_query: I need to plan a romantic dinner for my anniversary. Help me find a playlist on Deezer with romantic songs and get the basic user info of a popular artist on Soundcloud. Additionally, fetch the details of an album using the Shazam API to set the ambiance.

TaskList.description: Search for a romantic playlist on Deezer.
Fetch basic user information of a popular artist on Soundcloud.
Fetch details of a specific album using the Shazam API to set the ambiance.
